output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240002 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly refers to Nicolae-Ionel Ciucă, who is a presidential candidate (Position 4)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Uses broad messaging addressing voters in general - Has received significant impressions (35,000-39,999)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly promotes Nicolae Ciucă for president - Contains multiple endorsements from party leaders - Uses campaign slogans and calls for voting - Directly asks for votes on November 24 - Presents Ciucă as the best choice for president
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly promotional content, not journalistic - Contains party endorsements and campaign messaging - Has a CMF number
6. Personal opinion: No - These are official party statements - Structured as campaign messaging - Paid promotional content
The post is clearly electoral propaganda targeting the presidential election after the campaign period has ended.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Direct promotion of presidential candidate - Paid distribution - Clear electoral messaging - Multiple endorsements - Call to vote on election day
conclusion.message-for-police: PNL SĂLAJ, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul la presedintie Nicolae-Ionel Ciucă dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul, având ID-ul postării pe facebook 510922691951131, constituie propaganda electorală conform Art. 36(7) prin: (a) referirea directă la candidatul Nicolae-Ionel Ciucă, (b) utilizarea în afara perioadei permise, (c) obiectivul electoral explicit de influențare a votului prin îndemnuri directe de a-l vota pe candidat, și (d) depășirea limitelor activității jurnalistice. Postarea a fost promovată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, având un impact semnificativ prin atingerea a 35,000-39,999 de persoane.
